successes.title: The Lizzie Project
successes.description: A film following Lizzie's life, her journey to the other side of bullying, and her mission to inspire a more positive online world.

Pledges.description: Our sincere gratitude and receive weekly email updates about our progress complete with photos and stories from the set!
Our sincere gratitude, weekly email updates,  PLUS your name on TheLizzieProject.com's 'Supporter Hall of Fame!'
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS a digital download of Lizzie's book "Be Beautiful, Be You!"
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS a digital download of the documentary upon release. Delivery date depending on distribution schedule.
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS receive monthly postcards in the mail from Lizzie and the crew during our shoot from June through August!
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS an advanced digital download of the documentary including special features. Early delivery date depending on distribution schedule.
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS Lizzie will follow you on Twitter for the rest of 2014!
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS Lizzie will follow you on Instagram for the rest of 2014!
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS your name in the 'Thank Youâ€™ section of the credits of the final cut of our documentary!
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS an invitation to a Google Hangout with Lizzie!
All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS a special phone call from Lizzie to thank you for your support!

All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS two tickets to attend an early friends & family screening night in Austin this Fall! One night of hotel at the W in Austin included. Airfare not included.

All of the rewards previously mentioned, PLUS two tickets to attend an early friends & family screening night in Los Angeles this Fall! One night of hotel at the W in Westwood included. Airfare not included.

All of the rewards previously mentioned (excluding the early screening reward), PLUS you and a guest will walk the celebrity-studded red carpet premiere in Austin along with Lizzie and filmmakers, and attend the after-party and live concert! Two nights of hotel at the W in Austin included. Airfare not included.

All of the rewards previously mentioned (excluding the early screening reward), PLUS we will invite you and a guest to a celebratory dinner with Lizzie, the filmmakers, and collaborators in Austin. Two nights of hotel at the W in Austin included. Airfare not included.
